In England, in the seven days to 01 June, there were 34,970 new confirmed cases (61.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 May, there were 37,081 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 6% (2,111 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 06 June is 18,792,128 (33,230.9 cases per 100,000 population).
